response.overview: Agent Prince goes undercover as the leader of an up and coming crime syndicate to infiltrate the inner workings of the Mob. When her new frenimies go to far and kill Skyfire, she tries to arrest them on the spot with no backup! Agent Prince quickly learns what her friend Skyfire went through as she is captured and ravaged without the ability to change into Amazing Girl! After the men have their fill of Agent Prince they tie her to a chair with plans of coming back for another round.  When they return they see Agent Prince transform into Amazing Girl on their security feed and plan their attack. At first Amazing Girl is too much for the Mob and she dispatches all of them with ease. What she didn’t plan for was one of them having a soaked white rag! Amazing Girl tries to fight off the effects but becomes overwhelmed. The Mob teach Amazing Girl a lesson in pain and pleasure before using Skyfire’s belt against her!
response.title: Amazing Girl vs. The Mob
